title: Spaghetti with rocket, ham and lemon
ingredients: ['200g spaghetti', 'extra virgin olive oil, as needed', '2 slices Yorkshire ham, chopped', '1 red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, grated or crushed', '2 generous handfuls rocket', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'zest from 1 lemon', 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
